賌賌賌

賌字的基本解释

賌
gāi
古同“赅”。

賌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāi］
［《廣韻》古哀切，平咍，見。］
亦作“賌1”。“赅1”的繁体字。
(1)完备，齐全。
(2)概括，包括。
(3)方言。拥有。
(4)通“侅”。奇秘，不寻常。

賌字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賌； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1208第22
【字彙補】歌開切，音該。【淮南子·兵略訓】明於日月星辰之運，?德奇賌之數。【註】奇賌，隂陽奇秘之要。賌，音該。

賌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
賌字的起名意思

暂无。

Chu
Basic explanation of words
Chu
gāi
The ancient same "赅".
Chu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāi］
["Guangyun" ancient mourning, ping 咍, see you. ]
Also known as "賌1". "赅1" in traditional characters.
(1) Complete and complete.
(2) General, including.
(3) Dialects. have.
(4) Through "Ye". Strange secret, unusual.
Chu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　賌; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1208 Page 22
[Vocabulary supplement] The song is cut and the sound should be. [Huainanzi·Strategic Training] Ming is the luck of the sun, the moon and the stars, the number of Deqichang. [Note] The key to the secret of yin and yang. Long, the sound should be.
